attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern:

I am overly concerned about the increase in fees for immigration in the arena of
international adoption. The people who are reaching out to help children with no
hope are being penalized for some reason by an unnecessary government tax. All
we're talking about is a little paperwork and database files. Please reconsider a
request to keep the adoptions fees where they are and look for other places to find
additional revenue. We are U.S. citizens, and we come from a long line of
entrepreneural thinkers. If you need help brainstorming other ways, please don't
hesitate to contact me. I would love to serve my country in a way that doesn't
prohibit a child from having a mom or dad.

Thanks for your time.

Andy Braner
President Kanakuk Colorado
andy@kanakuk.com
417-331-2022
www.kanakuk.com

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Andrew Braner
